channel.title: Collin K. Berke, Ph.D.
channel.description: Recent content on Collin K. Berke, Ph.D.

item.title: Hello world! - The start of something new
item.description: Hello World! It’s time for me to start something new I have decided to start writing a blog. I have never attempted anything like this before, but I felt it was time to start organizing some of my projects and thoughts into one central location. For some time, I have really wanted a space where I could discuss things that I find interesting, both professionally and personally, and a place where I could further refine my thoughts.

item.title: About
item.description: Collin K. Berke, Ph.D. is a media research analyst in public media. Professionally, he uses data and media/marketing research methods to answer questions on how to best reach and engage audiences–towards the goal of enriching lives and engaging minds with public media content and services. He is interested in the use and development of open-source statistical software (i.e. Rstats) to achieve this goal, and developing a broader understanding the role it can play in media, digital, and marketing analytics.
